version_description:
1. "Boss Rush" mode is added. Test your skill in real hell!

2. 21-30 Stages in 5 Set are changed to Boss Stages.

3. A new rifle, "Vector" is added.

4. World Ranking is added to Hellgate mode.

5. New items added : Gun Collecti

- Gun Skin Customization System is added. You can collect unique skins in Lucky Box.
- GP reward for compeleting Boss Rush 5 set is increased
